name: Christine Kloser
offering: Book Cover Design, Book Editing and Layout, Book Fulfillment Services, Book Publishing, Book Publishing Classes, Book Writing Coach, Business Coaching, Compilation Books, Event Hosting, Group Coaching, Mastermind Groups, Publishing Services
what_you_do: Christine Kloser is a USA Today & Wall Street Journal Best-Selling Author, Award-Winning Publisher & Transformational Author Coach.
who_you_serve: Aspiring authors who want to write transformational nonfiction books.
social_proof: Christine Kloser is a four-time award-winning author, and her books have been featured in major media including Entrepreneur Magazine, Fox News, ABC, Los Angeles Times, and more. She has hit best-seller lists like USA Today, Wall Street Journal and Top 100 overall for Amazon print books, and her work has been personally endorsed by New York Times best-selling authors.
business_focus: Helping aspiring authors write and publish transformational nonfiction books.
